item.title: UE5 & Houdini - VAT
item.description: Installation Installation The VAT Vertex Animation Texures is a part of the SideFX Labs toolset Make sure that the SideFX Labs shelf is loaded You can press the Update Toolset button on far left on the shelf to update In the Out context add a Labs Vertax Animatiin Textures node On the node, click the “Real-Time Shaders” section. Click the Unreal Engine Content Plugin & Guides button to open up the dir.
